ygData.subject: Re: Shadowstep vs. Fade
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, but the lenght of transportation depends on your skill in alter I think and your level. So a lvl 8 using SS would not be any visible differencies compared
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, but the lenght of transportation depends on your skill in alter I think and your level. So a lvl 8 using SS would not be any visible differencies compared to fade. Not with me.
lvl 9 in beta, lvl 4 now.


Andrew Bryson wrote:

> The Shadowstep spell casts faster than Fade. The other nice thing is it moves you further away from the scene than Fade does.. sometimes (most times I find) it even gives you enough time to cast gate!
>
> Valacian - 16th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Stefan Raets [SMTP:SRAETS@...]
> Sent: Sunday, April 18, 1999 7:40 AM
> To: Eq_Wizards@Onelist. Com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Shadowstep vs. Fade
>
> From: "Stefan Raets" <SRAETS@...>
>
> Can anyone tell me what is better about Shadowstep? From the
> description it seems very similar to Fade ... so why should I buy
> Shadowstep?
>
> Aznyin
> Erudite Wizard, level 10
